title: Double digit market growth the key to success for Enterprise Social Software (ESS) providers in South America
text:
The report titled Enterprise Social Software Market - South America Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the South American market in terms of market size and the respective market forces (drivers, constraints, opportunities and challenges). This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
South America remains immature for ESS
Brazil has been identified as an emerging hub from the region followed by Argentina. It’s higher single digit growth, nearness to mature markets like USA and Canada and a common political consensus often remains the drivers for its recent success. IT industry in the country has started to pick up especially in cities like Manaus, Recife, Belo Horizonte and Rio de Janeiro. Additionally, Argentina, Colombia, Peru and Venezuela has started to pick up for technologies. However, when it comes to emerging technologies like ESS, currently there are very limited opportunities for growth. Focus from service providers is significantly less due to lack of awareness and need among its customers.
South America currently contributes to just 1.90% of the overall market share and this share is expected to further go down due to higher growth rates from better ESS markets like North America, Europe and APAC.
Market Segments and Forecasts Covered in the Report
The Global Enterprise Social Software market is segmented by:
- Regions (North America, Europe, APAC, South America, RoW)
- Deployment (On-Premise, Cloud)
- End users (Enterprise, Mid-size, Small Business)
- Industry (Financial Services, E-commerce, IT and Telecommunication, Healthcare, Retail, Others)
Companies discussed in the Global Enterprise Social Software market research report are IBM, Microsoft, Jive, Salesforce, Zimbra, Mzinga, SAP, Opentext Corp, Socialtext, eXo Platform, EMC, Oracle, Google, Interact Intranet, Alfresco, Infor, Elcom Technology, Autodesk, Sitrion, Spigit (Mindjet).
